scripts.clear:db: npm run basePath && cd src/db && node db.create.js
scripts.problems: npm run basePath && rm -rf ./problems/* && cd src && node problemsGenerate && node problemsParse
scripts.solutions: npm run basePath && rm -rf ./solutions/* && cd src && node solutionsGenerate && node solutionsParse
scripts.all: npm run clear:db && npm run problems && npm run solutions
